I use a wide variety of ides, tools and other resources that can be helpful. Below is a collection of links to some of the most popular resources and tools that I use.

All of the tools linked here are free of cost

Ides

  • Visual Studio Code
  • Visual Studio
  • Atom
  • Vim

Drawing tools

  • GIMP
  • Inkscape
  • Krita
  • MSPaint

MSPaint is a great tool actually no matter the look. A whole game`s art was made with only mspaint.

Audio and Sound effects

  • Audacity
  • BFXR
  • SFXR

From here these links are for purchasing assets online if you can’t or don’t have time to make to make game assets. They can be free of cost or priced

Online Assets

  • Open Game Art
  • Free Stuff
  • GameDev Market
  • GameTextures
